docstring.long_description: It takes two dataframes of label and feature from labelled training data and a dataframe of unlabelled input data.
docstring.short_description: Train a support vector machine (SVM) model for classification tasks.

parameters.name: kernel
parameters.description:
Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm.
For detailed information about kernel types:
https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/svm.html#kernel-functions

returns.description: The predictions for the input data.
